an4.20:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.20:4.3: Chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati—
an4.20:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.20:5.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an4.20:5.3: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati—
an4.20:5.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ saggeti.
an4.20:6.3: Chandā dosā mohā ca bhayā gāmino,
an4.20:6.4: Parisākasaṭo ca panesa vuccati.
an4.20:7.3: Dhamme ṭhitā ye na karonti pāpakaṃ,
an4.20:7.4: Na chandā na dosā na mohā na bhayā ca gāmino;
